trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for the state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Nummererer verdier for tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> property uses SynthesizerState to indicate the current state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A>Egenskapen bruker SynthesizerState for å vise gjeldende status for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> properties use SynthesizerState to indicate state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A>Egenskaper brukes SynthesizerState til å angi tilstanden til den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>når den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A>
Angir at det <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> er midlertidig stanset.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> is ready to generate speech from a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Angir at det <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> er klar til å generere tale fra en ledetekst.
